title: Greedy Algorithms
subject: Algorithms
theory: Builds solution piece by piece, always choosing the next piece that offers the most immediate benefit. Fast, but doesn't always guarantee global optimum.

interview_questions.question: Greedy vs DP?
interview_questions.answer: Greedy makes decision then solves subproblem (Top Down). DP solves subproblems then makes decision (Bottom Up / Memoized).
